titles.title: A bill to extend the existing suspension of duty on machines designed for heat-set, stretch texturing of continuous manmade fibers.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S4809, S4857)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: 4/22/1993--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend, through December 31, 1995, the existing suspension of duty on machines designed for heat-set, stretch texturing of continuous man-made fiber.
